Class BattleshipGUI

  • java.lang.Object

      • java.awt.Container

              • edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.battleship.BattleshipGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class BattleshipGUI
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    A gui class for playing battleship.
    Version:
    2.4 (CS56 Fall 2017)
    Author:
    Keenan Reimer, Wenjian Li (working since W14), Chang Rey Tang (W16), Joseph Song (W16), Barbara Korycki (F16), Edward Guardado (F16), Yuyang Su (F17), Kindy Tan (F17)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
